text: The Archdeacon of Sumner is the title of a senior post that has been used at certain times within the Anglican Diocese of Christchurch, part of the Anglican Church in Aotearoa, New Zealand and Polynesia.Crockford's Clerical Directories 1959/60; 1967/8; 1975/76 ==References== Category:Christianity in Christchurch Category:Archdeacons of Sumner
title: Archdeacon of Sumner
